Text:
Well, I've started every UL now, but only selected volumes - and way too many; why did I pick just about every language grammar? And so many because the title was puzzling.

I will seed and seed and seed; but I'll never be able to get the whole shebang.  I'm asking friends to pick the books they'd like; that'll add to the total I can UL/seed.

First there was The Pentagon Papers, then Wikileaks, then  CaptnKidd.
Tis an honor to share the same platform as those 2.  No worries about seeding, I got 100mbps connection.  Thanks!

Full list of all books in the collection (A to Z):

http://www.scribd.com/full/60753534?access_key=key-1at0sbxagnmet8i7w9jv

What I don't get is that TPB says there are at least two dozen seeders on some files of yours but uTorrent says ZERO for the most part, and that's the speed I get even when one or two seeders show up,

On the other hand - on my 150 max/rare DL speed total - I'm getting around 70 and 50 on two DLs.

Hmm. I just noticed that the 2 moving along so well (TZ) use https technology, and you have udp. Per a TZ tutorial I do not have DHT or Local peer enabled.  That a problem somehow? TZ certainly doesn't need them.

Gradually working my way through the alphabet of downloads, but wanted to go to this last one to just thank you for this incredible collection, and the work you've done to organize it and put it up here for all of us. Many, many thanks.
Great set of Torrents.  Just started the last one.  Still seeding all of them.
